thread.title: Top 10 landmarks in the world: TripAdvisor survey [Photos]
thread.title_full: Top 10 landmarks in the world: TripAdvisor survey [Photos]

title: Top 10 landmarks in the world: TripAdvisor survey [Photos]
text:
Tuesday, September 08, 2015 06:00 AM MDT Top 10 landmarks in the world: TripAdvisor survey Previous Next 
The 2015 TripAdvisor travel awards for Travelers' Choice Landmarks have been revealed and historic monuments, including Angkor Wat and Machu Picchu, were voted the top places to see. TripAdvisor determined the world's 10 highest ranked landmarks among travellers by using an algorithm that looked at the quantity and quality of the comments about these monuments over the past year. 1. Angkor Wat - Siem Reap, Cambodia. (Fotolia) 
2. Machu Picchu - Machu Picchu, Peru. (Fotolia) 
3. Taj Mahal - Agra, India. (Fotolia) 
4. Sheikh Zayed Mosque - Abu Dhabi, UAE. (Fotolia) 
5. Basilica of the Sagrada Familia - Barcelona, Spain. (Fotolia) 
6. Saint Peter's Basilica - Vatican City, Italy. (Fotolia) 
7. Milan Cathedral (Duomo) - Milan, Italy. (Fotolia) 
8. Alcatraz - San Francisco, California. (Fotolia) 
9. Corcovado - Christ the Redeemer - Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. (Fotolia) 
10. The Golden Gate Bridge - San Francisco, California. (Fotolia)
